typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select [Orders].orderID , 
OrderDate, 
FirstName, 
LastName, 
Address,
City, 
State, 
PostalCode, 
Country, 
Phone, 
SMSOptin, 
SMSStatus, 
Orders.Email, 
ReceiptUrl,
Total, 
PaymentTransactionId,
HasBeenShipped,
OrderDetailId,
ProductId,
Quantity,
UnitPrice
 from [dbo].[Orders], [dbo].[OrderDetails]
where [dbo].[OrderDetails].orderid = [dbo].[Orders].orderid',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
